text: Charles Yon (June 16, 1876 – October 1937) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at Susquehanna University from in 1902. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1876 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Susquehanna River Hawks football coaches Category:Susquehanna University alumni Category:People from Blair County, Pennsylvania
title: Charles Yon
